flavorText: From the barest crack in the ice, she teases forth a swirling, living map of the Cosmos.

foreignData.flavorText: Selbst einem winzigen Riss im Eis entlockt sie eine wirbelnde, lebendige Karte des Kosmos.
foreignData.name: Frostaugur
foreignData.text: {S}, {T}: Schaue dir die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek an. Falls es eine verschneite Karte ist, kannst du sie offen vorzeigen und auf deine Hand nehmen. ({S} kann mit einem Mana von einer verschneiten Quelle bezahlt werden.)

foreignData.flavorText: De la grieta más simple en el hielo saca un mapa del cosmos revuelto y vivo.
foreignData.name: Augur escarchada
foreignData.text: {S}, {T}: Mira la primera carta de tu biblioteca. Si es una carta nevada, puedes mostrarla y ponerla en tu mano. ({S} puede pagarse con un maná de una fuente nevada.)

foreignData.flavorText: Partant d'une simple fissure dans la glace, elle dessine une carte vivante et tourbillonnante du Cosmos.
foreignData.name: Augure de gel
foreignData.text: {S}, {T} : Regardez la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Si c'est une carte neigeuse, vous pouvez la révéler et la mettre dans votre main. ({S} peut être payé avec un mana d'une source neigeuse.)

foreignData.flavorText: È in grado di estrapolare una mappa vivente e vorticante del Cosmo dalla più semplice delle crepe nel ghiaccio.
foreignData.name: Augure del Gelo
foreignData.text: {S}, {T}: Guarda la prima carta del tuo grimorio. Se è una carta neve, puoi rivelarla e aggiungerla alla tua mano. ({S} può essere pagato con un mana da una fonte neve.)

foreignData.flavorText: ほんのわずかな氷の裂け目から、彼女は渦巻くありのままの星界の地図を引き出す。
foreignData.name: 霜の占い師
foreignData.text: {S}, {T}：あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードを見る。それが氷雪カードであるなら、あなたは「それを公開し、あなたの手札に加える。」を選んでもよい。（{S}は氷雪である発生源からのマナ１点で支払える。）
foreignData.type: 氷雪クリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード

foreignData.flavorText: 그녀는 얼음의 가장 작은 틈 사이로 소용돌이치며 살아있는 우주의 지도를 엿본다.
foreignData.name: 서리 점쟁이
foreignData.text: {S}, {T}: 당신의 서고 맨 위 카드를 본다. 그 카드가 눈 카드라면, 당신은 그 카드를 공개하고 당신의 손으로 가져갈 수 있다. ({S}는 눈 원천에서 만들어진 마나 한 개로 지불할 수 있다.)

foreignData.flavorText: Ela é capaz de extrair um mapa vivo e rodopiante do Cosmos da menor rachadura no gelo.
foreignData.name: Áugure do Gelo
foreignData.text: {S}, {T}: Olhe o card do topo de seu grimório. Se for um card da neve, você poderá revelá-lo e colocá-lo em sua mão. ({S} pode ser pago com um mana de uma fonte da neve.)

foreignData.flavorText: Из крохотной трещины во льду она вытягивает кружащуюся, живую карту Мироздания.
foreignData.name: Гадательница Мороза
foreignData.text: {S}, {T}: посмотрите верхнюю карту вашей библиотеки. Если это снежная карта, вы можете показать ее и положить в вашу руку. ({S} можно оплатить одной маной от снежного источника.)

foreignData.flavorText: 哪怕冰面只有一道光秃裂痕，她也能从其上闪转腾挪，演绎出一幅活灵活现的寰宇地图。
foreignData.name: 冰霜卜算师
foreignData.text: {S}，{T}：检视你的牌库顶牌。如果它是雪境牌，则你可以展示该牌并将它置于你手上。（{S}能以产自雪境来源的一点法术力来支付。）

foreignData.flavorText: 哪怕冰面只有一道光禿裂痕，她也能從其上閃轉騰挪，演繹出一幅活靈活現的寰宇地圖。
foreignData.name: 冰霜卜算師
foreignData.text: {S}，{T}：檢視你的牌庫頂牌。如果它是雪境牌，則你可以展示該牌並將它置於你手上。（{S}能以產自雪境來源的一點魔法力來支付。）

name: Frost Augur
originalText: {S}, {T}: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a snow card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)

rulings.text: Snow is a supertype, not a card type. It has no rules meaning or function by itself, but spells and abilities may refer to it.
The {S} symbol is a generic mana symbol. It represents a cost that can be paid by one mana that was produced by a snow source. That mana can be any color or colorless.
Snow isn’t a type of mana. If an effect says you may spend mana as though it were any type, you can’t pay for {S} using mana that wasn’t produced by a snow source.
Some cards have additional effects for each {S} spent to cast them. You can cast these spells even if you don’t spend any snow mana to cast them; their additional effects simply won’t do anything.

The Kaldheim set doesn’t have any cards with mana costs that include {S}, but some previous sets do. If an effect says such a spell costs {1} less to cast, that reduction doesn’t apply to any {S} costs. This is also true for activated abilities that include {S} in their activation costs and effects that reduce those costs.

text: {S}, {T}: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a snow card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
